_comment: ProxiCraft Configuration - See README for full documentation
_rangeNote2: -1=unlimited BUT limited by game's chunk loading (~12 chunks = ~192 blocks by default).
_rangeNote3: Chunk loading controlled by: Video>View Distance (client) or ServerMaxAllowedViewDistance (server).
_rangeNote4: Setting range > chunk loading distance has no benefit - unloaded containers aren't in memory.
_storageSourcesNote: STABLE - What containers to search for items. These only affect WHERE items come from, not HOW they're used.
_stableFeaturesNote: STABLE - Core features using simple postfix patches. Very unlikely to break on game updates.
_transpilerFeaturesNote: LESS STABLE - Features using transpiler patches. May need updates when game code changes. The mod will auto-detect and warn if these break.
_newFeaturesNote: NEW - Additional stable features using simple postfix patches.
